p: There have been attempts to identify barriers for providing evidence-based care and clinical services for people with PD in the MENASA countries [ 52]. Within the context of existing literature, and through a series of conferences, we aimed to assess existing data and available care for PD patients in the MENASA countries. Based on that, the task forceÂ members agreed on eight priority areas to improve the status of PD care and other movement disorders in the region. The following is a discussion of these items.
